title: MD
biography: Zulkifli bin Ismail is a Malaysian politician who has served as the Member of Parliament (MP) for Jasin since November 2022. He is a member of the Malaysian Islamic Party (PAS), a component party of the Perikatan Nasional (PN) coalition.
aiSummary: Zulkifli Ismail is a pediatrics specialist with an H-index of 23 at Asia Pacific Pediatric Association (Member). Has been published in Arab Journal of Basic and Applied Sciences, Lancet (London, England), Journal of Advanced Research in Fluid Mechanics and Thermal Sciences. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
